abstract: Vietnamese authorities arrest Nguyen Ngoc Nhu Quynh, blogger who writes under name Mother Mushroom and is known for criticizing country's one-party government; Quynh is accused of distorting truth and spreading anti-government propaganda.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: Nguyen Ngoc Nhu Quynh, a co-founder of the Network of Vietnamese Bloggers, has challenged leaders over topics including a dump of toxic chemicals.
snippet: Nguyen Ngoc Nhu Quynh, a co-founder of the Network of Vietnamese Bloggers, has challenged leaders over topics including a dump of toxic chemicals....

headline.main: Vietnam Arrests Mother Mushroom, a Top Blogger, for Criticizing Government
headline.print_headline: Vietnam Arrests Crusading Blogger Known as Mother Mushroom
